description: Namespace provides a scope for Names. Use of multiple namespaces is optional.

status.description: Status describes the current status of a Namespace. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status

spec.description: Spec defines the behavior of the Namespace. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status
